content.label: Yea this wasn't that great in my opinion. Definitely not worth $3. Don't buy it.
I'd like to play it, but it crashes on iPad 1 before the title screen.
Love it!! Truly addicting
Fast response, fun and some times challenging. Fun for all ages! Pikey guy here, and this is totally worth it's cosy!

title.label: Fun but has a few bugs.

content.label: This is a very good game. It has intuitive gameplay, a background story that's pretty interesting, BUT it crashes if you play it for a long time. You could fix the crashes and few bugs by restarting you iPod/iPhone/iPad.

I assumed (incorrectly) that this game must be awesome from all of the hype. Boy was I wrong! I learned my lesson to always read the critical reviews before falling for all of the rave ones. They (critical) are spot on. I was surprised at how much I disliked this supposed awesome game. It was boring and much too difficult to earn a minute piece of the "puzzle". Not worth .99
The graphics are brilliant, the music is wonderful, and the gameplay is... magical. The most unique game I've played. Never seen anything quite like it. Keep up the good work Simogo!

Some are saying that there is no "goal" ...but there is! On your way you collect the memories to reveal a beautiful story. The goal is completing that story and it is all completely worth it. Favorite app ever:)
Great game. I adore the love story aspect.
this game looks nice but is SO boring. your car cant even go fast. the pace is set by the slow moving screen. just jump and move slow. bored now.

title.label: Beautiful game marred by shallow gameplay

content.label: A perfect example of form over substance.  The game is graphically something to behold, but it's ultimately a boring, repetitive one trick pony from a gameplay standpoint.  Disappointing.

I bought this with hesitation because i didnt know if it was worth it .But did it anyway cause of the reviews on the internet. Now i see its better than it looks , and its looks are the best. Music also top notch , kinda reminds me of lil big planet. BTW like everyone else i want the winter and summer added (alps and beach)

This game and all of Simogos other creations are some of my favorite apps on my iPod.  I've gotten all of Simogo's games and all of them are in my top ten app list.  Please make more games.  You'll be sure I will get it!

I love the spring and autumn games.  Beautiful art and excellent addictive fun gameplay.  Love the music...why aren't the lights on when driving at night (car and lamp posts)??  Would love a winter or summer (alps and beach) added!

I'm pretty lousy at this game, and yet I love it. That's high praise considering that - due to an acute case of perfectionism - I generally dislike games that I'm not good at. Bumpy Road, however, is irresistible. It is utterly charming in every aspect. The design is winsome, the music delightful, the story heartwarming, but never syrupy. For me, it's worth falling down a hundred holes just to snatch one more snapshot of Bumpy Road's winning couple. This game is a truly lovely trip down memory lane.
This game is a work of art.
it's the most beautiful app i ever seen. i love the music very much.even the app 's description is so nice.I love it!

title.label: This game is nicely thought out but...

content.label: I'm not a huge fan... I was disappointed with it when I first played. Maybe I can actually get used to it and have better control of the car but at this point I have no such luck. It's a nice, cute game I am just not that hooked as other players are.

Bumpy Road is a good and challenging platform game. The graphics are unique and new, and the background music is probably my favorite compared to any other music of iPhone games. Give it a try...I do not think $2.99 is too much -- it's a steal at that price.
You will love this game...if you like incredibly boring games that have no point to them.
Terrible. Total waste of 3 bucks. Crap.
Really nice graphics and what not, but not my type of game. $3 wasted.
Fun, playful game executed nicely

What the what are you people talking about? This is one of the best games in the app store. I admit that the controls are a bit different, but you get used to it after a while. Great execution, though I do think that the memory slide things are a bit sparse.

When in dout, make a pro/con list:
Pros:
Absolutly the most beautiful, charming, and adorable app out there. The art work is great. 
Fun and a challenge
Interesting and knew idea, havent seen a thing like it

Cons:
Somtimes hard to control
Frusterating when one of the story clip/slides passes you
Again, challenge.

buy it!!!! Its a beautiful app, and the control problems can be fixed!!
The BEAUTIFULEST Game, Enough Said .
Hard In beginning but very Fun! I can't put I down!! 
Fun, Relaxing and not to expensive. I would highly suggest this. Perfect for a rainy day
this game got AWSOME graphics but it get boring for 0.99 ehh i think it should be free

It's a cute game with a clever control scheme, but it's too hard to control and there's no real purpose to all the junk you collect beyond trying to get a high score. Skip this one - it looks great but quickly gets boring.

title.label: Too hard, 1 mistake and game over.

content.label: Ridiculous...1 wrong move and game over. A bit extreme. And how long do we have to drive without a mistake to find just ONE picture frame? This game is frustrating. Not recommended. DELETED.

Finally an app with great graphics. simply a wonderful game. such a simple idea, done sooo very well. and the music is a great touch too. it puts me in a good mood :) a definite 10 out of 5. keep up the great work! :)
I am wordless... Good graphics and ideas but horrible execution, simply horrible

This app is very amazing!!! It has wonderful graphics music and a cute story!!! Although I did think this game would be a bit more fun... It is actually very slow and a bit boring. But that's just my opinion. Overall this is an excellent app especially while on sale!!!
Good game you guys should put more themes in other than that don't change anything

title.label: Pretty but not that much fun

content.label: I guess I'm not a fan of endless games that don't have missions. I find this game is nice to look at, it has an interesting and novel control concept, and it has nice music, but I got bored after playing it once or twice. I wouldn't really recommend this game.

I got it and absolutely loved it! I have finished getting all the pictures and the story is adorable. So far, i have not experienced any crashes and the game works just fine for me. The initial launch screen takes a bit, but not as long as some other games and applications i have so its no big deal for me. OVER ALL, ONE OF MY FAVORITE GAMES!

I keep seeing content that I don't want when the game ends. After that I see information that I want to keep private. Then I get mad and keep starting the game over and over again. Also, I experience that the game is automatically ended due to a programming error.
Great graphics .. Great Game idea .. Nice music .. 5 out of 5 :D .. I LOVE IT!!

I have the 16 Gb iPad 1. got the game the day the update came out. Has crashed every time, just after the clock disappears from the logo screen. Sorry about using a review to send this information. I wish there was a better way to relay bugs.
great music and well done

Let me start by saying that there are several positive aspects to the game: the graphics are handsome and unique, the soundtrack is quirky and perfectly compliments the visuals and the controls are innovative. Sadly however this is not enough to offset the games fatal flaw: it's boring. I had high hopes for this game but it lacks any depth that will keep you playing past a minute or so. It's simply an endless runner with a unique control scheme and unfortunately all the visuals and sound in the world can't save this game from it's lackluster gameplay. The game is regularly priced at $2.99 which is $2 more than it ever should be. Right now the game is fairly priced at 99 cents but I still wouldn't recommend it, even at that price, as there are a ton of offerings in the app store that give you more bang for your buck
cool thing for passing time but maybe add cars to unlock or more characters to be or outfits for them at least

title.label: Not as good as I hoped

content.label: For 2.99 I was expecting much more.

Controls are frustrating, fully collecting the story photos will take forever, and the gameplay is repetitive, really this game should have been 1$ from the start like any endless runner even though it's sugar coated nicely.
Intuitive controls, satisfying play, pleasant progression. Please buy (especially when it's on sale <3)!

Firstly, I'm bringing up the facts that the other reviewers lack. Now, u say there's nothing to work for when u don't have levels, but when u get free game center on your iPhone and iPad, u can get achievements. Also, u can feel like u have progressed when your on your 10th day in the game. Now about the controls. In a way, there is multi touch. U can use 1 thumb to make the car go backwards, and your other thumb to make it go forward. Oh, and if your launching cars into holes, that's not the games fault. Your just bad at playing, cuz I used to do that to, but u get the hang of it. Oh, and FYI, the plot is just that they r takin a drive thru town, and if u don't like it, then obviously u didn't read the info, u just bought it.

So all in all, it's a great game. If your looking for cuteness and u have game center, buy it. If your a geeky game addict who has a t-mobile phone or something with no game center, don't. Sorry if some of the other reviewers feel kinda stupid, but it's the truth. :)

title.label: Love the art, not the game

content.label: I was ready for this to be a sweet little game, like Tiny Wings. Disappointed.

Don't pay no mind to the haters. It's definitely a different sort of game, one that rewards you for wanting to find out more about the couple you're helping along. The controls take a little getting used to but that's like any other game with a very different gameplay approach. And of course, the game is truly beautiful. One of the few games (Tiny Wings is another example) that fills me with happiness whenever I play it. Should be a way more popular game than it is.
Do not get this app
